Player History
Had first career hit on 3/31/2013, off Jeff Samardzija (CHC)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/8/2013, off Drew Storen (WAS)...
Injured on 6/3/2013 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for one week...

Won Gold Glove at First Base in 2015...
1/30/2016: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,342,857 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 5/3/2016 with a Torn Hip Muscle, out for 3 weeks...
Injured on 6/7/2016 with a Bruised Heel, out for one week...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/28/2016, hitting .474 with 5 HR, 10 RBI...

Won Player of the Week award on 5/29/2017, hitting .458 with 3 HR, 10 RBI...
8/8/2017: Signed a contract extension with Miami, $4,000,000 per year, for 3 years.
Won Gold Glove at First Base in 2017...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Traded from Miami to Oakland on 2/14/2020 (Going to OAK: 1B Logan Morrison, RF Felix Marte. Going to MIA: P Chris Kohler, CF Christopher Dehner)...
Injured on 8/5/2020 with a Broken Wrist, out for full season...
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles (N) on 2/2/2021 to a 3-year deal worth $15,000,000 per year...
Drove in 6 runs against Los Angeles (A) on 5/22/2021...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/14/2022, hitting .458 with 3 HR, 12 RBI...

Drove in 7 runs against Atlanta on 8/21/2023...
